remarks: A variable introduction law for ordered pairs.  Analog of Lemma 15 of [Monk2] p. 109.  (Contributed by NM, 28-May-1995.)
statement:
eqvinop.1 $e |- B e. _V $.
eqvinop.2 $e |- C e. _V $.
eqvinop $p |- ( A = <. B , C >. <-> E. x E. y ( A = <. x , y >. /\ <. x , y >. = <. B , C >. ) ) $.
$d A x y $.
$d B x y $.
$d C x y $.
